data.event: In 1810, Joseph Hudson arrived in Breckinridge County, taking land that would forever be known as Hudson.

event.title: ran the mill and blacksmith shop at McDaniels for 60 years

data.event: The first settlers at Hudson were George Holmes, Rafeal Cox, Doctor George Legrand, Steve Critchelow (the father of Bill and Tom Critchelow, who ran the mill and blacksmith shop at McDaniels for 60 years), Henry Tucker, and Mac Jauncy.
